name: The Last Custodian - Demo: Arcadia
description:
The Last Custodian is finally getting near to completion... so in celebration of this and reaching 1k followers on Twitter I've decided to release an arcade style demo... hence the name Arcadia ;)

Please note that this Demo is an arcade version of The Last Custodian. In the main game you have freedom to explore each system, add ship upgrades, and level up the Custodian as you fight your way across the galaxy.

Controls:
Movement: WASD
LMB: Fire rail gun
RMB: Fire homing missile (targets closest enemy to cursor)
Shift: Speed boost
Z: Zoom In/Out
C: Toggle shields/point defence

Aim of the demo:  Survive for as long as you can against an increasing number of enemies per wave. Unlike the actual game, you have unlimited energy, but keep an eye on the capacitor charge level of your weapons and missiles. The ships hull will slowly repair while in orbit around Arcadia. Don't stay still for too long though!
The game auto saves after each wave. So you can exit and jump back in for more spaceship blasting action when ever you feel like it :)

Points:
Enemy Ship = 10
Bio Matter = 2
Scrap Material = 1
Using Missiles = -1!

Tips:

  •  Shields recharge faster when powered down
  • Enemy missiles can be shot and destroyed
  • Point defence will protect against missiles but not lasers, so keep moving!

Game Design, Programming, and Art by Luke Blackburn
(Twitter: @OddSocksDev)

Music by Scowsh
(Twitter: @ScowshMolosh)

Donations would be much appreciated and will go towards development costs for both myself and Scowsh - thanks in hopeful advance! :)
